name: Blossom Blast
description:
Controls:

  • WASD - Movement
  • Spacebar - Shoot

Cute little shmup I put together for fun in a couple of days (way longer than it should have). 

You play as Bloom, a pink-haired girl with butterfly wings and the ability to fire Love at everything. Fly into [space] and shoot down some monsters! 

Goes up to ten (10) levels with a boss at the end.
